data.title: Nvidia name-checks Michael Burry in secret memo pushing back on AI bubble allegations
data.description: The chipmaker quietly circulated a private memo to analysts that explicitly name-checked investor Michael Burry and pushed back on many of his claims.
data.author: Yun Li
data.keywords: Artificial intelligence,Generative AI,Cisco Systems Inc,NVIDIA Corp,Markets,Stock markets,Wall Street,Investment strategy,Breaking News: Business,Breaking News: Investing,Breaking News: Markets,business news
